pkmkdoc.description: This installer will add the GoCast Player browser plug-in to your computer. This will enable you to have video and voice conversations on the web.

requirement.message:
The browser plug-in is 32-bit only. This means on your computer each browser acts differently.

- Safari may have issues with the plug-in.
- Firefox may require a restart into 32-bit mode.
- Chrome will work with no issues.
